cause.description:
Our goal is to make it so that people must be able to play WoW whenever they would like. Who needs work when you have WoW!
1. Anti-Job
2. Pro-Laziness
3. Pro-WoW
cause.mission: Is to make World of Warcraft the most important thing in a persons life!
cause.name: Fund for people to play WoW instead of going to work!
